description: This file defines a plugin class for creating empty partitions in a build system, specifically a class named EmptyPartitionPlugin that inherits from SourcePlugin, with methods to handle partition preparation.

classes.name: EmptyPartitionPlugin
classes.description: A plugin class used for creating unformatted empty partitions during image creation.

methods.name: do_prepare_partition(cls, part, source_params, cr, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, rootfs_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Class method called to prepare a partition by populating its content, effectively setting up an empty partition in the image.

ctags.name: do_prepare_partition
ctags.pattern: /^    def do_prepare_partition(cls, part, source_params, cr, cr_workdir,$/
ctags.signature: (cls, part, source_params, cr, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, rootfs_dir, native_sysroot)
